params._prevTotalBorrowed: The total borrowed amount not including the new borrow amount

preReconcile(uint256,uint256,uint256,add.details: Should not revert in case of over-repayment. Instead, it is recommended to return the full loan balance as repayAmount_ where necessary.

params._prevTotalRepaid: The total repaid amount not including the reconciled assets
params._repayableLoanAssetAmount: The loanAsset amount available for repayment

returns.repayAmount_: The formatted amount to consider as repayment in terms of the loanAsset

params._prevTotalRepaid: The total repaid amount not including the new repay amount

receiveCallFromLoan(bytes).details: No actions implemented in this module

calcFaceValue(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the canonical face value of the loan

getAccountingInfoForLoan(address).notice: Gets the AccountingInfo for a given loan

preBorrow(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Implements logic immediately prior to effects and interactions during a borrow

preClose(uint256,uint256).notice: Implements logic immediately prior to effects and interactions when closing a loan

preReconcile(uint256,uint256,uint256,add.notice: Implements logic immediately prior to effects and interactions during a reconciliation, and returns the formatted amount to consider as a repayment

preRepay(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Implements logic immediately prior to effects and interactions during a repay, and returns the formatted amount to repay (e.g., in the case of a user-input max)

receiveCallFromLoan(bytes).notice: Receives and executes an arbitrary call from the loan contract
